name: Hyperball
description:
Hyperball is a virtual reality networked ball sport game.

This game was designed for fun and competitiveness.

  • Fun to play !
  • Online Multiplayer
  • Friend invite : invite a Steam friend directly into your match
  • Play without headset so you can play with your friends even without a vr device
  • Solo game vs ia
publishers: Good Job Games Bilisim Yazilim ve Pazarlama AS
